doc:
Tod Browning https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tod_Browning 0 Tod Browning (born Charles Albert Browning, Jr.; July 12, 1880 – October 6, 1962) was an American film actor, film director, screenwriter and vaudeville performer. Browning's career spanned the silent film and sound film eras. Best known as the director of Dracula (1931), Freaks (1932), and silent film collaborations with Lon Chaney and Priscilla Dean, Browning directed many movies in a wide range of genres. Tod_Browning ( born Charles_Albert_Browning , Jr. ; July_12 , 1880 – October_6_,_1962 ) was an_American_film_actor , film_director , screenwriter_and_vaudeville_performer . Browning 's_career spanned the_silent_film_and_sound_film_eras . Best known as the_director of Dracula_(_1931_) , Freaks_(_1932_) , and silent_film_collaborations with Lon_Chaney and Priscilla_Dean , Browning directed many_movies in a_wide_range of genres .
